activity.oae-label: ACTIVITY TYPE: FILL IN THE BLANKS
activity.title: Dictation
activity.instructions: Listen to the conversation. Type the words you hear to complete the conversation. Then check your answers.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

page.text: A: <blank word="Where" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="was" blanksize="Small"/> your husband <blank word="born" blanksize="Small"/>? B: <blank word="Here" blanksize="Small"/>. In Toronto. A: And <blank word="did" blanksize="Small"/> he <blank word="grow" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="up" blanksize="Small"/> here? B: No. He <blank word="grew" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="up" blanksize="Small"/> in Italy.

page.text: A: <blank word="What" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="would" blanksize="Small"/> you <blank word="like" blanksize="Small"/> to <blank word="study" blanksize="Small"/>? B: Me? <blank word="I'd" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="like" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="to" blanksize="Small"/> study <blank word="architecture" blanksize="Medium"/>. What about you? A: I'm going to study <blank word="nursing" blanksize="Medium"/>. B: And <blank word="would" blanksize="Small"/> you <blank word="like" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="to" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="have" blanksize="Small"/> children some day? A: <blank word="Actually" blanksize="Medium"/>, no. But I <blank word="would" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="like" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="to" blanksize="Small"/> <blank word="get" blanksize="Small"/> married.
